1070140.name: Crystar - Kokoro's Mascot Costume
1070140.description:
Change your outfit with this new cosmetic skin for Kokoro. All outfits are available once the playable character joins the party.

Explore Purgatory with a brand-new skin! Dress up as an animal mascot that represents each character:
Rei: Thelema, her dog
Kokoro: Wolf
Sen: Lion
Nanana: Bird
If you have a character in your party wearing one of these costumes, Revenants with uncollected memoirs will be drawn to you. Don these costumes to collect all the Memoirs of the Dead.
*The feature only works on levels where Revenants with memoirs appear.
